text:
Hi Owen
 
It's really nice to meet you. My story is long so I will try to make it short. 
I decided to go back to school at the age of 33 as a single mother. I did an AEC at Grasset Institute in Animation/3D and special effects but was not supper satisfied at the end especially the Nuke part so I decided to go to NAD in the Nuke super intensive course with Xavier Bourque. He was a great teacher and tried to show us as much as possible with the time we had but there is so much more thing's I wanted to see and learn.
I would of love to learn more on compositing and also VFX.
I am at the age of 35 now finishing my demo but at the same time I guess I am a little afraid or shy and I have so many questions but in 1 year from now I would love to be a lead comp or VFX and in 3 to 5 years a supervisor.

Anyways enough of me :) 
How about you
